data.name: TS Marketplace: South London Network Scenario Pack 01
data.detailed_description:
Featured DLC

https://store.steampowered.com/app/222638
https://store.steampowered.com/app/376946
https://store.steampowered.com/app/325963
https://store.steampowered.com/app/258663


About the Game

Expand your South London experience with 10 authentic and engaging scenarios from Larias Games!

South London Network Scenario Pack 01 sees you take charge of the Capital’s commuter services, rushing across the complex array of lines and calling at dozens of stations to keep the city moving. Enjoy a mix of traction as you drive across the network, including:

  • Class 375 and 465 on Southeastern services
  • Class 377, 455 and 456 on Southern services
  • Class 378 on London Overground services

Face tight timetables and adverse weather conditions, and perform everything from ordinary commutes to empty stock and depot manoeuvres! Step up to the challenge with Larias Games’ South London Network Scenario Pack 01!

Included Scenarios


  • SLN 1.01: 9C49 1732 Highbury & Islington to West Croydon
  • SLN 1.02: 2D18 0652 Orpington to London Victoria
  • SLN 1.03: 2F46 1620 London Victoria to London Bridge
  • SLN 1.04: 2J61 2014 London Bridge to Caterham
  • SLN 1.05: 9H04 0615 Clapham Junction to Dalston Junction
  • SLN 1.06: 1450 London Victoria to East Grinstead
  • SLN 1.07: 2K17 9021 West Croydon to London Victoria
  • SLN 1.08: 2M88 1628 London Victoria to Orpington
  • SLN 1.09: Southern Transfer
  • SLN 1.10: South London Early Bird

Please Note: South London Network Route Add-On, Chatham Main Line - London-Gillingham Route Add-On, Southern Class 455/8 EMU Add-On and London Overground Class 378 'Capitalstar' EMU Add-On are required, as separate purchases, in order to play the scenarios featured in this add-on.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum for 32-bit:
  • OS: 32-bit Windows 7 Service Pack 1, 8.1 or 10 Required (Other OS versions and types are not supported)
  • Processor: Intel Core-i3 4330 3.50 GHz Dual Core or AMD A8 6600K 3.90 GHz Quad Core or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon R9 Graphics with 1 GB Dedicated VRAM or Better
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Connection (May incur additional costs for use)
  • Storage: 40 GB or more available space (Additional Add-Ons will require more)
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Requires mouse and keyboard or Xbox Controller
Laptop, Notebook, Mobile or Low Power versions of the above specifications (including Intel or Integrated Graphics) may work but are not supported. Updates to Chipset, Graphics and Audio Device Drivers may be required. For information relating to recommended specifications for Train Simulator 64-bit, please refer to the Train Simulator 2019 User Guide.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended for 32-bit:
  • OS: 32- or 64-bit Windows 7 Service Pack 1, 8.1 or 10 Required (Other OS versions and types are not supported)
  • Processor: Intel Core-i5 4690 3.50 GHz Quad Core or AMD Ryzen 7 1700 3.80 GHz Quad Core or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM (maximum possible under 32-bit Windows)/16 GB or Better (For 64-bit Windows)
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 480 with 4 GB Dedicated VRAM or Better
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Connection (May incur additional costs for use)
  • Storage: High Performance SSD Recommended with 40 GB or more available space (Additional Add-Ons will require more)
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Requires mouse and keyboard or Xbox Controller
Laptop, Notebook, Mobile or Low Power versions of the above specifications (including Intel or Integrated Graphics) may work but are not supported. Updates to Chipset, Graphics and Audio Device Drivers may be required. For information relating to recommended specifications for Train Simulator 64-bit, please refer to the Train Simulator 2019 User Guide.
